result_list.explanation: Le Baron sort. (The Baron exits.) This falls under the 'exit' category as the character is leaving the stage.
Elle rentre dans le château. (She enters the castle.) This falls under the 'exit' category as the character is leaving the current scene by entering the castle.
Voyant approcher Gustave. (Seeing Gustave approaching.) This falls under the 'movement' category as it describes a character's movement.
AIR. De la Royale, etc. (TUNE. De la Royale, etc.) This falls under the 'music' category as it describes a tune.
Air : Babet que t'es gentille ! (TUNE: Babet you are so kind!) This falls under the 'music' category as it describes a tune.
Montval, lit. (Montval, reads.) This falls under the 'action' category as it describes a general character action.
Elle sort avec Octave. (She exits with Octave.) This falls under the 'exit' category as the character is leaving the stage.
Il lui serre le bout des doigts. (He squeezes the tips of her fingers.) This falls under the 'interaction' category as it describes a non-verbal interaction between characters.
result_list.stgdir: Il lui serre le bout des doigts.

result_list.explanation: Montrant sa bague. (Showing her ring.) This falls under the 'object' category as it describes an interaction with an object.
Il fait un pas pour s'en aller et revient toujours. (He takes a step to leave and always comes back.) This falls under the 'movement' category as it describes a character's movement.
result_list.stgdir: Il fait un pas pour s'en aller et revient toujours.
